summary:
Lithuania, officially the Republic of Lithuania, is a European country by the Baltic Sea. It's one of three Baltic states, bordering Latvia, Belarus, Poland, and Russia's Kaliningrad Oblast. With a population of 2.88 million, its capital is Vilnius. 

Lithuania was first united in the 1230s and became a large and powerful Grand Duchy. It later formed a union with Poland, known as the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. After being occupied by Russia, Lithuania gained independence in 1918. It was then occupied during World War II by the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany before regaining independence in 1990. Today, Lithuania is a developed country and member of the European Union and NATO.
title: Lithuania
